name: splunk-spl-to-elasticsearch-dsl
description: Convert Splunk SPL to Elasticsearch DSL with pegjs

scripts.build: node_modules/pegjs/bin/pegjs --format umd --export-var splToDslConverter -o lib/converter.js lib/splunk.pegjs && gulp && npm run test
scripts.prepublish: npm run-script build && npm run test

author: Anonymity94 <1176989591@qq.com>
